00029 AnalogModule* AnalogModule::GetInstance(UINT32 slot)
00030 {
00031     if (CheckAnalogModule(slot))
00032     {
00033         if (m_modules[slot] == NULL)
00034         {
00035             m_modules[slot] = new AnalogModule(slot);
00036         }
00037         return (AnalogModule*)m_modules[slot];
00038     }
00039     return NULL;
00040 }
00041 
00048 UINT32 AnalogModule::SlotToIndex(UINT32 slot)
00049 {
00050     return slot - 1;
00051 }
00052 
00064 AnalogModule::AnalogModule(UINT32 slot)
00065     : Module(slot)
00066     , m_module (NULL)
00067     , m_sampleRateSet (false)
00068     , m_numChannelsToActivate (0)
00069 {
00070     status = 0;
00071     AddToSingletonList();
00072     m_module = new tAI(SlotToIndex(slot), &status);
00073     SetNumChannelsToActivate(kAnalogChannels);
00074     SetSampleRate(kDefaultSampleRate);
00075 
00076     for (UINT32 i = 0; i < kAnalogChannels; i++)
00077     {
00078         m_module->writeScanList(i, i, &status);
00079         SetAverageBits(i + 1, kDefaultAverageBits);
00080         SetOversampleBits(i + 1, kDefaultOversampleBits);
00081     }
00082 
00083     if (m_registerWindowSemaphore == NULL)
00084     {
00085         // Needs to be global since the protected resource spans both module singletons.
00086         m_registerWindowSemaphore = semMCreate(SEM_Q_PRIORITY | SEM_DELETE_SAFE | SEM_INVERSION_SAFE);
00087     }
00088 
00089     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00090 }
00091 
00095 AnalogModule::~AnalogModule()
00096 {
00097     delete m_module;
00098     m_modules[m_slot] = NULL;
00099 }
00100 
00108 void AnalogModule::SetSampleRate(float samplesPerSecond)
00109 {
00110     // TODO: This will change when variable size scan lists are implemented.
00111     // TODO: Need float comparison with epsilon.
00112     //wpi_assert(!sampleRateSet || GetSampleRate() == samplesPerSecond);
00113     m_sampleRateSet = true;
00114 
00115     // Compute the convert rate
00116     UINT32 ticksPerSample = (UINT32)((float)kTimebase / samplesPerSecond);
00117     UINT32 ticksPerConversion = ticksPerSample / GetNumChannelsToActivate();
00118     // ticksPerConversion must be at least 80
00119     if (ticksPerConversion < 80)
00120     {
00121         wpi_fatal(SampleRateTooHigh);
00122         ticksPerConversion = 80;
00123     }
00124 
00125     // Atomically set the scan size and the convert rate so that the sample rate is constant
00126     tAI::tConfig config;
00127     config.ScanSize = GetNumChannelsToActivate();
00128     config.ConvertRate = ticksPerConversion;
00129     m_module->writeConfig(config, &status);
00130 
00131     // Indicate that the scan size has been commited to hardware.
00132     SetNumChannelsToActivate(0);
00133 
00134     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00135 }
00136 
00145 float AnalogModule::GetSampleRate()
00146 {
00147     UINT32 ticksPerConversion = m_module->readLoopTiming(&status);
00148     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00149     UINT32 ticksPerSample = ticksPerConversion * GetNumActiveChannels();
00150     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00151     return (float)kTimebase / (float)ticksPerSample;
00152 }
00153 
00159 UINT32 AnalogModule::GetNumActiveChannels()
00160 {
00161     UINT32 scanSize = m_module->readConfig_ScanSize(&status);
00162     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00163     if (scanSize == 0)
00164         return 8;
00165     return scanSize;
00166 }
00167 
00179 UINT32 AnalogModule::GetNumChannelsToActivate()
00180 {
00181     if(m_numChannelsToActivate == 0) return GetNumActiveChannels();
00182     return m_numChannelsToActivate;
00183 }

00194 {
00195     m_numChannelsToActivate = channels;

00208 void AnalogModule::SetAverageBits(UINT32 channel, UINT32 bits)
00209 {
00210     m_module->writeAverageBits(channel - 1, bits, &status);
00211     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00212 }

00224 {

00255 UINT32 AnalogModule::GetOversampleBits(UINT32 channel)

00259     return result;

00270 INT16 AnalogModule::GetValue(UINT32 channel)
00271 {
00272     INT16 value;
00273     CheckAnalogChannel(channel);
00274 
00275     tAI::tReadSelect readSelect;
00276     readSelect.Channel = channel - 1;
00277     readSelect.Module = SlotToIndex(m_slot);
00278     readSelect.Averaged = false;
00279 
00280     {
00281         Synchronized sync(m_registerWindowSemaphore);
00282         m_module->writeReadSelect(readSelect, &status);
00283         m_module->strobeLatchOutput(&status);
00284         value = (INT16) m_module->readOutput(&status);
00285     }
00286 
00287     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00288     return value;
00289 }
00290 
00303 INT32 AnalogModule::GetAverageValue(UINT32 channel)
00304 {
00305     INT32 value;
00306     CheckAnalogChannel(channel);
00307 
00308     tAI::tReadSelect readSelect;
00309     readSelect.Channel = channel - 1;
00310     readSelect.Module = SlotToIndex(m_slot);
00311     readSelect.Averaged = true;
00312 
00313     {
00314         Synchronized sync(m_registerWindowSemaphore);
00315         m_module->writeReadSelect(readSelect, &status);
00316         m_module->strobeLatchOutput(&status);
00317         value = m_module->readOutput(&status);
00318     }
00319 
00320     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00321     return value;
00322 }
00323 
00336 INT32 AnalogModule::VoltsToValue(INT32 channel, float voltage)
00337 {
00338     if (voltage > 10.0)
00339     {
00340         voltage = 10.0;
00341         wpi_fatal(VoltageOutOfRange);
00342     }
00343     if (voltage < -10.0)
00344     {
00345         voltage = -10.0;
00346         wpi_fatal(VoltageOutOfRange);
00347     }
00348     UINT32 LSBWeight = GetLSBWeight(channel);
00349     INT32 offset = GetOffset(channel);
00350     INT32 value = (INT32) ((voltage + offset * 1.0e-9) / (LSBWeight * 1.0e-9));
00351     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00352     return value;
00353 }
00354 
00363 float AnalogModule::GetVoltage(UINT32 channel)
00364 {
00365     INT16 value = GetValue(channel);
00366     UINT32 LSBWeight = GetLSBWeight(channel);
00367     INT32 offset = GetOffset(channel);
00368     float voltage = LSBWeight * 1.0e-9 * value - offset * 1.0e-9;
00369     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00370     return voltage;
00371 }
00372 
00383 float AnalogModule::GetAverageVoltage(UINT32 channel)
00384 {
00385     INT32 value = GetAverageValue(channel);
00386     UINT32 LSBWeight = GetLSBWeight(channel);
00387     INT32 offset = GetOffset(channel);
00388     UINT32 oversampleBits = GetOversampleBits(channel);
00389     float voltage = ((LSBWeight * 1.0e-9 * value) / (float)(1 << oversampleBits)) - offset * 1.0e-9;
00390     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00391     return voltage;
00392 }
00393 
00404 UINT32 AnalogModule::GetLSBWeight(UINT32 channel) 
00405 {
00406     UINT32 lsbWeight = FRC_NetworkCommunication_nAICalibration_getLSBWeight(m_module->getSystemIndex(), channel - 1, &status);
00407     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00408     return lsbWeight;
00409 }
00410 
00421 INT32 AnalogModule::GetOffset(UINT32 channel)
00422 {
00423     INT32 offset = FRC_NetworkCommunication_nAICalibration_getOffset(m_module->getSystemIndex(), channel - 1, &status);
00424     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00425     return offset;
00426 }
